Posts.Content: CRangi wrote: Hello, I am currently 7months pregnant and my right areola has been really puffy on the bottom half for about a month now. The entire breast seem fuller than my left. I have an ultrasound today. Im so scared as I have googled puns found lots on this being a sign of ductual breast cancer. I have a seven and five year old with another bub on the way. Im so scared of not being there while the young grow up. Anyone know of this happening during pregnancy Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Half a puffy areola in pregnancy In right breast CRangi CRangi
